== Usage ==

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `compact` attribute on the following elements:

  * [DirElement <dir>]
  * [DlElement <dl>]
  * [MenuElement <menu>]
  * [OlElement <ol>]
  * [UlElement <ul>]
